issue.message: The Google Play store has a policy that limits usage of MANAGE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE
Call requires API level 33 (current min is 23): `launchChangeAppLanguageIntent`
Attribute `appCategory` is only used in API level 26 and higher (current min is 23)
Attribute `localeConfig` is only used in API level 33 and higher (current min is 23)
Missing URL
Missing URL
Missing URL
The application should not provide its own launch screen
A newer version of com.android.application than 8.3.0 is available: 8.6.1. (There is also a newer version of 8.3.𝑥 available, if upgrading to 8.6.1 is difficult: 8.3.2)

issue.message: It will always be more efficient to use more specific change events if you can. Rely on `notifyDataSetChanged` as a last resort.
